page.title: 13HALE RELIEF ROAD
page.content: On the Upper Hale road there is a car every 7 seconds at a quiet time.There is at least 1 accident on the Hale road in one week.One of the benefits of having a by_pass through the park is that it would be quieter for the people who live on the road. Another benefit is that there will be less traffic on the Hale road and therefore fewer accidents.Although having a by_pass would help the Upper Hale Road it would spoil the park and pollute the air as well as spoiling walks and peoples leisure.
